name: bootstrap-textures
description: Easily apply textures to Bootstrap 4 elements

scripts.css: npm run css-minify && npm run css-compile
scripts.css-minify: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/textures.scss -o dist/ && mv dist/textures.css dist/textures.min.css && mv dist/textures.css.map dist/textures.min.css.map
scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/textures.scss -o dist/

author: TheNewSound <thenewsound@worldwidecrap.nl> (https://worldwidecrap.nl/)
